meanings.definition: Small white or grey flakes of dead skin found in a person's hair.
meanings.sent1: She brushed off the dandriff from her hair.
meanings.sent2: The hairstylist recommended a special shampoo for dandriff.
meanings.sent3: The dandriff on his head looked like tiny snowflakes.
meanings.sent4: The dandriff scattered on her shoulders like confetti.
meanings.sent5: The dandriff was so noticeable, it made her self-conscious.

meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by the shedding of these flakes.
meanings.sent1: His dandriff was visible even from a distance.
meanings.sent2: Many people use medicated treatments to control dandriff.
meanings.sent3: The dandriff on his head seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her dandriff problem felt like a never-ending battle.
meanings.sent5: The dandriff made her scalp itchy and uncomfortable.
